about_the_game:
Across The Globe

A grand Strategy Game Set In 19th-century World.

Play The World

  • Detailed world map, with five different projections to choose from.
  • World wide trade network, witness globalization at its onset.
  • Multi-thread optimized game engine, fast load and fast turns.

Dynamic population

  • People reproduce, age, die, migrate and change jobs.
  • Government, economy, military are all fueled by your people.
  • Different ideas steer the course of society.

Realistic Economy

  • Prices respond to demand and supply.
  • Producers expand and shrink.
  • Elastic demand depending on income and prices.

Great Power Diplomacy

  • Land and naval combat to conquer foes.
  • Influence lesser nations to enforce free trade.
  • Intervene in wars to contain your rivals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (sixth generation or newer) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A nation simulator set in 19th-century. Acquire resources, research technologies, build infrastructure, conquer foes. Experience dynamic population, realistic economy and great power diplomacy.
